pinyin: Zhèxiē rén hú chī hǎi hē, làngfèi le hěn duō qián.

en: When you arrive at the tourist destination, you can enjoy eating and drinking to your heart's content and relax.
pinyin: Dào le lǚyóu dìdiǎn, kěyǐ hú chī hǎi hē, hǎo hǎo fàngsōng yīxià.

en: My room is always cluttered.
pinyin: wǒ de fángjiān zhěng tiān dōu shì zhuāng

en: Seeing the mess on the table, I decided to clean it up.
pinyin: kàn dào zhuōzi shàng de zhuāng, wǒ juédìng dǎsǎo yíxià

en: In traditional Chinese culture, shrouds are used to wrap the bodies of the dead.
pinyin: zài zhōng guó chuán tǒng wén huà zhōng, guǒ shī bù shì yòng lái bāo guǒ sǐ rén de bù.

en: She sorrowfully donned black shroud clothing to mourn her relative.
pinyin: tā bēi shāng de chuān shàng le hēi sè de guǒ shī bù fú zhuāng lái zhuī dào qīn qi.

en: Shrouds for ancient nobles were often made of luxurious silk fabric.
pinyin: gǔ dài guì zú de guǒ shī bù tōng cháng shì yòng huá lì de chóu duàn zhì chéng de.

en: Take the opportunity to do what you want to do with all your heart.
pinyin: hǎo hǎo chèn xīn, zuò zì jǐ xiǎng zuò de shì qíng.

en: She has always yearned to go on a trip and enjoy herself fully.
pinyin: tā yī zhí dōu chōng jǐng zhù hǎo hǎo chèn xīn de qù lǚ yóu.

en: You can relax and take it easy for a while.
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ chèn xīn, fàng sōng yī xià.

en: He has the talent to become an excellent debater.
pinyin: tā jù bèi chéng wéi yī míng chū shì de biàn shì de tiān fù

en: In the courtroom, lawyers typically need a strong talent for speaking and reasoning.
pinyin: zài fǎ tīng shàng, biàn shì tōng cháng xū yào yǒu qiáng dà de kǒu cái hé néng lì

en: Auntie's job position has changed, she moved from the management level to a more secondary role.
pinyin: ā yí de gōng zuò gǎng wèi biàn dòng le, cóng guǎn lǐ céng tuì jū èr xiàn qù le.

en: The former prime minister decided to step back and focus on his personal research project.
pinyin: zhè wèi qián zǒng lǐ jué dìng tuì jū èr xiàn, kāi shǐ zhuān xīn yú zì jǐ de yán jiū xiàng mù.

en: My friend did something that made me very upset, so I left the group.
pinyin: Hǎo yǒu zuò le ràng wǒ hěn shēng qì de shì qíng, yú shì wǒ tuì qún le.

en: There is always someone posting advertisements in our work group, and I’ve had enough of it, so I made a decision to leave the group.
pinyin: Wǒ men dān wèi de qún lǐ zǒng shì yǒu rén fā guǎng gào, wǒ shí zài shòu bù liǎo le, yú shì jué dìng tuì qún le.

en: There are too many people in this WeChat group, and hundreds of messages come in every day. Sometimes I can’t keep up, so I want to leave the group.
pinyin: Zhè gè wēi xìn qún lǐ rén tài duō le, měi tiān dū huì yǒu jǐ bǎi tiáo xìn xī, yǒu shí hòu wǒ gēn bù shàng, suǒ yǐ xiǎng tuì qún.

en: Make good use of your free time, don't waste time.
pinyin: Hǎo hǎo lìyòng xiánkòng shíjiān, bùyào xūdù guāngyīn.

en: She is studying English during her free time.
pinyin: Tā zhèngzài xiánkòng shíjiān lǐ xuéxí yīngyǔ.

en: Now I have some free time, I don't know where to go for fun.
pinyin: Xiànzài wǒ yǒuxiē xiánkòng, bù zhīdào qù nǎlǐ wán.

en: our sales revenue is one of the key performance indicators set by the company.
pinyin: guān jiàn jì xiào zhǐ biāo. This month

en: The coating of this phone is very strong and not easily broken when dropped.
pinyin: zhè gè shǒu jī de fù miàn céng fēi cháng jiān gù, bù pà shuāi huài.

en: Adding a layer of coating to our furniture and appliances can help protect them from scratches.
pinyin: gěi wǒ men de jiā jù jiā diàn dōu jiā shàng fù miàn céng, kě yǐ bǎo hù tā men bù bèi guā huā.

en: This type of coating can be used to produce eco-friendly coatings, without causing pollution to the environment.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng tú liào kě yǐ yòng lái zhì zuò huán bǎo de fù miàn céng, bù huì duì huán jìng zào chéng wū rǎn.

en: Good mountains and good water have formed a beautiful natural atmosphere.
pinyin: Hǎo shān hǎo shuǐ xíngchéng le yōuměi de zìrán fēnwéi.

en: The warm atmosphere of the coffee shop he runs has attracted many customers.
pinyin: Tā jīngyíng de kāfēi tīng wēnxīn de fēnwéi xīyǐn le zhòngduō gùkè.

en: The actors created a mysterious atmosphere for the movie through their excellent performance.
pinyin: Yǎnyuánmen tōngguò jīngcǎi de biǎoyǎn wèi diànyǐng hōngtuō chū le yī zhǒng shénmì de fēnwéi.

en: Many people use electric mosquito swatters to drive away mosquitoes in summer.
pinyin: hǎo duō rén xià tiān yòng diàn wén pāi lái gǎn zǒu wén zi.

en: I don't like to hear the sound of an electric mosquito swatter hitting insects.
pinyin: wǒ bù xǐ huān tīng dào diàn wén pāi dǎ jī de shēng yīn.

en: Xiao Ming killed a fly with an electric mosquito swatter.
pinyin: xiǎo míng yòng diàn wén pāi dǎ le yī zhī cāng yíng.

en: In order to accurately estimate the project's risk, we need to conduct detailed market research.
pinyin: wèi le zhǔn què píng gū xiàng mù de fēng xiǎn gū jì, wǒ men xū yào jìn xíng xiáng xì de shì chǎng yán jiū.

en: Investors need to seriously consider the risk estimation of stock trading in order to make the right decisions.
pinyin: tóu zī zhě xū yào rèn zhēn kǎo lǜ gǔ piào jiāo yì de fēng xiǎn gū jì, cái néng zuò chū zhèng què de jué cè.

en: Before making any business decisions, companies must conduct risk estimation and analysis.
pinyin: zài jìn xíng rèn hé shāng yè jué cè zhī qián, qǐ yè bì xū jìn xíng fēng xiǎn gū jì hé fēn xī.
